scripts.build:bussiness-owners: ng build bussiness-owners && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=bussiness-owners OUTPUT_PATH=frontadmin node post-build.js
scripts.build:adminportal: ng build --project adminportal&& cross-env PROJECT_NAME=adminportal OUTPUT_PATH=frontadmin node post-build.js
scripts.build:hr: ng build --project apps-hr && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-hr OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:erp: ng build --project erp-home && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=erp-home OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:sales: ng build --project apps-sales && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-sales OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:finance: ng build --project apps-finance && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-finance OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:inventory: ng build --project apps-inventory && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-inventory OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:purchase: ng build --project apps-purchase && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-purchase OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:accounting: ng build --project apps-accounting && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-accounting OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:bussiness-owners: ng build bussiness-owners --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=bussiness-owners OUTPUT_PATH=frontadmin node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:adminportal: ng build --project adminportal --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=adminportal OUTPUT_PATH=frontadmin node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:hr: ng build --project apps-hr --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-hr OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:erp: ng build --project erp-home --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=erp-home OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:sales: ng build --project apps-sales --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-sales OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:finance: ng build --project apps-finance --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-finance OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:inventory: ng build --project apps-inventory --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-inventory OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:purchase: ng build --project apps-purchase --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-purchase OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:cloud:accounting: ng build --project apps-accounting --configuration=cloud && cross-env PROJECT_NAME=apps-accounting OUTPUT_PATH=frontapps node post-build.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:bussiness-owners && npm run build:adminportal && npm run build:inventory  && npm run build:hr && npm run build:erp && npm run build:sales && npm run build:finance && npm run build:purchase && npm run build:accounting
scripts.build:allcloud: npm run build:cloud:bussiness-owners && npm run build:cloud:adminportal && npm run build:cloud:inventory && npm run build:cloud:hr && npm run build:cloud:erp && npm run build:cloud:sales && npm run build:cloud:finance && npm run build:cloud:purchase && npm run build:cloud:accounting
scripts.start:erp: concurrently "npm run start:erp-gateway"  "npm run start:inventory" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:accounting" "npm run start:hr" "npm run start:sales" "npm run start:finance"  "npm run start:purchase"
scripts.start:hr-gateway: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:hr"
scripts.start:accounting-gateway: concurrently "npm run start:erp-gateway" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:accounting"
scripts.start:sales-gateway: concurrently "npm run start:erp-gateway" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:sales"
scripts.start:finance-gateway: concurrently "npm run start:erp-gateway" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:finance"
scripts.start:purchase-gateway: concurrently "npm run start:erp-gateway" "npm run start:erp-home" "npm run start:purchase"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:erp" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:bussiness-owners" "npm run start:adminportal"
